excerpt.rendered: You’ve probably heard the term two factor authentication, or 2FA in regards to signing into websites and other applications. 2FA as a second layer of security used when logging in to ensure your information is protected from someone else trying to log into your accounts. Passly is a utility built to protect the usage of your credentials.
